nodes.text: NT-757 was a Human Imperial stormtrooper who wielded an E-11 blaster rifle during the Galactic Civil War. A fearless soldier in the Stormtrooper Corps, NT-757 had a knack for controlling local populations during important Imperial operations.
NT-757 first appeared on a card for the Masters of the Force expansion set of Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
